department.en: MSc in Hydrologocal and  Oceanic Sciences
department.ch: 水文與海洋科學研究所碩士班

goal.en: The object of course is to instruct the students the basic knowledge of meteorology and the thermal interaction between ocean and atmosphere.
goal.ch: 大氣海洋交互作用。大氣如何影響海洋動力發展，海洋如何影響大氣的變化。教導學生基本的氣象知識與海洋/大氣之間能量平衡作用。

content.en:
“Atmospheric structure, composition of air, general circulation of the atmosphere, and the surface ocean circulation
air temperature, humidity, lapse rate, clouds, fog, and tropical cyclone
thunderstorms and El Ni?o“
content.ch:
“地球大氣層結構、大氣成份、大氣主環流系統與表層海流
氣溫、溼度與氣溫遞減率、雲/雨/霧及大氣穩定性
氣團、鋒面、季風、海洋熱帶氣旋/反氣旋、熱帶氣旋
雷雨系統、聖嬰現象
台灣常見的天候現象
海上天候狀況“

textbook.en: “Marine meteorology Introduction to Theoretical Meteorology, Hess, 1959. Discovering the Weather, Ezra Bowen, 1982, John Canova“
textbook.ch: “Marine meteorology Introduction to Theoretical Meteorology, Hess, 1959. Discovering the Weather, Ezra Bowen, 1982, John Canova“

domain.en: 水文循環 、 水文環境
domain.ch: 水文循環 、 水文環境
